```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

Load the pulse data

```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Wide format to long format

```{r}
pulse_data_tidy = 
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  relocate(id, visit) %>% 
  mutate(visit = recode(visit, "bl" = "00m"))
```
